titles.title: Come We That Love The Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Come, we that love the Lord, newline And let our joys be known; newline Join in a song with sweet accord, newline And thus surround the throne.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Let those refuse to sing, newline Who never knew our God; newline But children of the heavenly King, newline May speak their joys abroad.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: The hill of Zion yields newline A thousand sacred sweets, newline Before we reach the heavenly fields, newline Or walk the golden streets.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Then let our songs abound, newline And every tear be dry; newline We're marching thru Emmanuel's ground, newline To fairer worlds on high.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: The men of grace have found newline Glory begun below; newline Celestial fruit on earthly ground newline From faith and hope may grow.
